video.title: My Babysitter's a Vampire
video.synopsis: Ethan, Benny and fledgling vampire Sarah battle zombies, demons and the other supernatural beasties that regularly threaten their school.

episodes.synopsis: When Benny wants to impress a girl at school, he does what any boy with a spellbook would do: he resurrects her dead dog, Puffles.
episodes.title: Lawn of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Erica and Sarah join the Whitechapel Devils cheer squad. Worried about what Erica may do, Ethan and Benny have to go "undercover" to stop her.
episodes.title: Three Cheers for Evil

episodes.synopsis: Whitechapel High hasn't won a sports trophy in thirty years, and the ghost of Coach Ed thinks it's time to win another.
episodes.title: Friday Night Frights

episodes.synopsis: Ethan and Benny suspect the school's hairiest jock, and their new best friend, of being a werewolf. All they have to do is prove it. And trap him.
episodes.title: Blue Moon

episodes.synopsis: The nurses of Red Rider blood donations sink their needles into Whitechapel High. All that blood is huge temptation for Sarah.
episodes.title: Blood Drive

episodes.synopsis: When Ethan wins a contest to hang out with a TV paranormal investigator Doug Falconhawk, he worries that three of his friends are huntable vampires.
episodes.title: Doug the Vampire Hunter

episodes.synopsis: Ethan's younger sister Jane accidentally uses Benny's spellbook to bring her Debbie Dazzle doll to life.
episodes.title: Guys and Dolls

episodes.synopsis: Benny sells his grandmother's old magic camera to his classmate Hannah at a yard sale, but the camera creates an evil twin of the subject.
episodes.title: Jilly Putty

episodes.synopsis: Ethan wants to ask Sarah out, but doesn't think much of his chances. Benny decides to help them both by whipping up a love potion.
episodes.title: Smells Like Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Strange vines are growing through the school's computer lab, and into the students! Ethan and Benny take charge to pull the weeds.
episodes.title: Die, Pod!

episodes.synopsis: There's something in the coffee at LottaLatte, and it's turning people into zombies. Sarah has to get to the bottom of what caused this outbreak.
episodes.title: The Brewed

episodes.synopsis: When a boring babysitting night becomes a séance, an ancient demonic spirit is released - and finds a host in Sarah!
episodes.title: Three Geeks and a Demon

episodes.synopsis: The Fly Off to the Moon dance is approaching, and Ethan and Benny want to go in style, but the return of an old enemy puts a wrinkle in their plans.
episodes.title: Jesse's Girl

episodes.synopsis: Sarah finally returns, accustomed to being a vampire. Meanwhile, Ethan is determined to find a cure for vampirism.
episodes.title: Welcome Back Dusker

episodes.synopsis: After Mr. G unearths a mysterious crystal skull from his garden, he inadvertently summons an ancient Mayan queen.
episodes.title: Say You'll Be Maztak

episodes.synopsis: After Ethan finally gets his learner's permit, he buys an old, rusty jalopy from a garage sale. Just his luck, the car turns out to be possessed!
episodes.title: Fanged and Furious

episodes.synopsis: When the town's water pressure mysteriously drops and two teens vanish, the gang begins to suspect that something fishy is going on.
episodes.title: Flushed

episodes.synopsis: The hockey team's star player has the strongest arms, legs and hands in the league -- but the limbs were all stolen ... and Ethan's brain is next.
episodes.title: Jockenstein

episodes.synopsis: When the school put on a production of "The Rainbow Factory" 25 years ago, a prank resulted in the death of the star -- who's back for revenge.
episodes.title: Mirror/rorriM

episodes.synopsis: During the annual cookie drive for Jane's youth troop, a creepy, otherworldly troop leader conspires to rid the town of all adults.
episodes.title: Village of the Darned

episodes.synopsis: A mummy follows Benny home from a museum and is revived as a suave Egyptian prince -- who later shows up at school to charm Sarah.
episodes.title: Hottie Ho-Tep

episodes.synopsis: Ethan and Benny discover that a singer who has a voice like an angel is really a siren -- a creature who sings a destructive tune.
episodes.title: Siren Song

episodes.synopsis: Ethan's Halloween party turns dangerous when Rory's magical mask transforms the guests into real-life versions of their costumes.
episodes.title: Halloweird

episodes.synopsis: After Ethan, Benny and Sarah boast about being able to handle adventures on their own, Benny's grandmother teaches them all a lesson.
episodes.title: Independence Daze

episodes.synopsis: Looking for something called the Lucifractor, an intruder raids the Vampire Council. But Ethan is worrying about his first date with Sarah.
episodes.title: The Date to End All Dates: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While trying to recover the fearsome Lucifractor, Ethan and Benny learn the truth about what -- and whom -- they're up against.
episodes.title: The Date to End All Dates: Part 2
